body:
If you are reading this comment you will get impotence for the rest of your life. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other dojins. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk
If you read everytjing until here: the curse above is here being dismissed, don't need to paste it anywhere. You get protection from ALL curses on this site for 1 year, congrats. Please, repost this to protect other people.
Kisaragi Miyu, you're a fucking God. Thanks you for all.
